titles.title: Teacher Tax Reduction Act of 2009
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the deduction for certain expenses of elementary and secondary school teachers to $500 and to extend it through 2011.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
1/6/2009--Introduced.
Teacher Tax Reduction Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue to increase to from $250 to $500 the dollar limit on the tax deduction for certain expenses of elementary and secondary school teachers and to extend such deduction through 2011.
